name: The Devil's Glitch
description:
Play The Devil's Glitch ! This game was made from scratch in 72 hours for Wowie Game Jam 2 !!

It is a narrative fiction, in some retro-gameboy style, where you play as Jack, a poor and lost soul that has nothing to look up in life. He will eventually meet someone...interesting, that will change everything.

We hope you enjoy !
